Package groupOne.game

Class AssetSetter

java.lang.Object
groupOne.game.AssetSetter
public class AssetSetter extends Object
Class sets up the locations of Assets on the 32x18 tile screen It has a GamePanel field, a constructor, and setup methods.

This class will be used in the GamePanel class to set up objects and enemies at the start of the game, before the player is rendered. Another method called closeEntrance will seal off the starting tile when the player finishes collecting the rewards

Necessary to set up the game before the player sees it

  • Constructor Details

    • AssetSetter

      public AssetSetter(GamePanel gp)
      Constructor takes in a GamePanel parameter

      The AssetSetter must know the tileSize, as well as the objects being used in the GamePanel's object array

      Parameters:
      gp - a GamePanel detailing the size of the screen and types of objects
      See Also:
      • GamePanel

  • Method Details

    • placeEnemy

      public void placeEnemy(int index, int map, int x, int y)
      Places enemy at list index "index" to coordinates "x" and "y"
      Parameters:
      index - Index of object in list
      map - Map number of object
      x - X coordinate of object
      y - Y coordinate of object

    • setObjects

      public void setObjects()
      Places objects on the screen using the GamePanel field. These objects are set up before the game enters its play state.

      This class will be used in the GamePanel class to set up objects at the start of the game, before other entities are rendered on the screen.

      The board is 25x15, x goes from 0 to 29, y goes from 0 to 14 The section below the board is for the UI

    • closeEntrance

      public void closeEntrance()
      CloseEntrance method closes the entrance, moving a previously set Gate Object to the entrance of the board

    • setObject

      public void setObject(Integer x, Integer y, AssetSetter.ObjectType type, Integer mapNum, Integer index)
      Set an typed object at a x,y coordnate
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of the object to be placed
      y - Y coordinate of the object to be placed
      type - Type of the object to be placed
      mapNum - The ID of the map loaded
      index - the index of the S_object array to set the object occupying

    • setBonus

      public void setBonus()
      SetBonus method sets the Bonus object to a certain tile on the board. The bonus will be in index 16 of the array

    • removeBonus

      public void removeBonus()
      RemoveBonus method sets the Bonus object to null, destroying it This method will be called if the player fails to collect the bonus reward

    • openGate

      public void openGate()
      OpenGate method switches out the original Gate objects with Door objects, which use the gate_open sprite

    • setEnemy

      public void setEnemy()
      SetEnemy method creates enemies on the board at various locations

    • setSpawnTime

      public void setSpawnTime()
      Random spawn timer for the bonus reward, spawns between 8 and 15 seconds
